amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to strike provisions relating to the Commission on Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation and to strike the $50 million appropriated for such commission.
amendment.purpose: An En Bloc amendment to strike the provisions in the paragraph establishing the makeup of the commission and to strike $50 million in appropriation for the Commission on Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation.

action.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey amendments (A016) Failed by voice vote.
